channel.title: Marijuana, Legal or Illegal
channel.description:
Please say the answer you chose and why :)
Legal, Marijuana can benefit America not only medically but also recreationaly. Marijuana is said to kill brain cells but that is with 100% pure THC and on monkeys the percent of THC in marijuana that is smoked is around 10-20%. Marijuana also provides a cure for nausea, and helps the appetite of AID's patients.

item.title: Marijuana, Legal or Illegal
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

[quote=“kenashi, post:28, topic:8017”]I want it to stay illegal, it’s a narcotic and causes various cancers. If it supposedly makes people regrow brain cells or tissuse, why are 99.9% “stoners” still dumbasses?

One more thing, it’d be real smart to get real high then go right on ahead with our day, and see how many people survive :D[/quote]thats a stareotype but it seems pretty much true but it has nuthing to do with the weed. just all the preppy goody goods dont try it and go on to there cubical jobs and what not. but the most people that try it are teens that seem dubm and most of them are. when im with anyone i seem like im a dumbass bu i know alot about alot of things.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 11:03:05 AM[/size][hr][quote=“kenashi, post:32, topic:8017”]got shine read this, you’re the dumbass http://www.drugs.com/Hashish/index.html
Pot reduces reaction time and judgement, you need those. Also, you’re gonna smell like shit and look like it.
You might not die from pot but, if you’re getting high it’s not good for you. Do you even smoke, if you do, it’s your life, do what you want with it, if you get caught with pot you’re the one who’s screwed, not me. and i havent gone to church in years, you need to calm down and get other hobbies than defending pot with your life.[/quote]dude! wtf? that site sayd that you smpoke the dryd leaves and stems and shit. that sites retarded… you smoke the buds take out the stems and try to not have to meany leavs. that sites what and is soccar mom propaganda.

edit: im pissed at that site. its not a drug. its not addictive like they say. who the fuck puts crack in there blunts? im sure if you smoke crack in your weed all the time and that all you get youll be addicted, but not to the weed lol.

they say that weed makes you not able to lean but thats a stearo type… your not dumb because you smoke weed, you smoke weed because your dumb. you dont play basketball because your black, your black because you play basketball.(thats not a good example, but still)

Read full topic

I consider Weed a gateway drug. Some people who have done it, haven’t done anything else. However, name one person that does something like Coke, Ecstacy, or Heroin who didn’t Try weed as there first drug.

item.title: Marijuana, Legal or Illegal
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

[quote=“kenashi, post:28, topic:8017”]I want it to stay illegal, it’s a narcotic and causes various cancers. If it supposedly makes people regrow brain cells or tissuse, why are 99.9% “stoners” still dumbasses?

One more thing, it’d be real smart to get real high then go right on ahead with our day, and see how many people survive :D[/quote]Wow you really have no idea what you’re talking about. Its been proven that no pot causes no cancers at all. There are other ways of getting THC(if you don’t know what that is just go jump off a cliff, you shouldn’t be talking about pot with no prior knowledge) into your system then smoking it. Even if you do smoke it, it is a very rare case that it cancer is a result. The reason being, you don’t chain smoke it like you would a cigarette, have you ever heard of someone smoking 20 joints a day repeatedly? Let alone 20 in one day. And your last statment made me laugh. Have you ever been high? Have any of your little church buddies been high? Do you know anything about pot other then the propaganda from various angry soccer moms out there? No. The answer is no. Pot is not dangerous. How many times have you heard a stoned person(ONLY HIGH ON POT) commit a crime? Ok. Now how many times have you heard a drunk person commit a crime?

You’re like a muslim at the vatican. You don’t know what the fuck is going on, so gtfo.

Read full topic

item.title: Marijuana, Legal or Illegal
item.dc:creator: @IheartMaryJane IheartMaryJane
item.description:
@IheartMaryJane wrote:

I want it to stay illegal, it's a narcotic and causes various cancers. If it supposedly makes people regrow brain cells or tissuse, why are 99.9% "stoners" still dumbasses?

One more thing, it’d be real smart to get real high then go right on ahead with our day, and see how many people survive

Just because it regrows some brain cells does’nt mean that its going to make a dumbass turn into genius.

I usually have a morning smoke before school and so does my friend and we’ve never killed anyone, done something insane, or gotten caught.
